newsitem.title: UK: UK Aug car sales up nearly four pct on year - TV.
newsitem.headline: UK Aug car sales up nearly four pct on year - TV.

text.p: August sales of new cars in Britain have risen by almost four percent compared with the same month last year and the total could reach 500,000, independent television news channel ITN reported.
ITN did not give figures for how many cars had been sold, but said motoring analysts were heartened by the increasing number of private buyers.
Sales of new cars in Britain in August 1995 rose by 3.6 percent to 468,945 compared with August 1994.
August usually generates about a quarter of annual car sales because it is the month when the prefix on registration plates changes. The final August figures are due to be issued next week.
